page.title: 17Population
page.content: {Population The population in mid 1983 was 1480. The 1981 Census revealed that 26% of the village's population was aged 60 or over, compared with the Moray District average of 18% {Number of houses In 1983, the number of houses in Fochabers stood at - {Local authority 225 {Private 374 with 68 households on the Ditrict waiting list. A 13 acre site has been set aside for private housing, some of which may be developed by a Housing association for elderly persons in Fochabers. {Existing character retained The centre of Fochabers is covered by this policy which ensures that developments do not conflict with, nor detract from, the enivronment.
